https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/51JDrlnAZoJJdtBcGKzDbY0DTSx.jpg A teenaged prodigy painter preparing for his widely anticipated coming‐of‐age exhibition falters under pressure and slips off his medication. In his mania, he recruits a band of Bushwick rebel artists to take part in his progressively subversive show—one that will leave mouths agape. Art Machine
